segment.source: Planning for Application Virtualization System Deployment
segment.target: Planning for Application Virtualization System Deployment

segment.source: This section provides important information to help you plan your deployment of Microsoft Application Virtualization.
segment.target: This section provides important information to help you plan your deployment of Microsoft Application Virtualization.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: Best Practices for the Application Virtualization Sequencer
segment.target: Best Practices for the Application Virtualization Sequencer

segment.source: Provides important security-related planning information about setting up the Application Virtualization Sequencer to sequence application packages.
segment.target: Provides important security-related planning information about setting up the Application Virtualization Sequencer to sequence application packages.

segment.source: Planning the Application Virtualization Sequencer Implementation
segment.target: Planning the Application Virtualization Sequencer Implementation

segment.source: Provides planning guidance for implementing the App-V sequencer.
segment.target: Provides planning guidance for implementing the App-V sequencer.

segment.source: Using Electronic Software Distribution as a Package Management Solution
segment.target: Using Electronic Software Distribution as a Package Management Solution

segment.source: Provides planning guidance for using an electronic software distribution system to manage application package content, including setting up publishing and streaming.
segment.target: Provides planning guidance for using an electronic software distribution system to manage application package content, including setting up publishing and streaming.

segment.source: Using Application Virtualization Servers as a Package Management Solution
segment.target: Using Application Virtualization Servers as a Package Management Solution

segment.source: Provides the planning information necessary for managing application package content in an Application Virtualization Server-based deployment.
segment.target: Provides the planning information necessary for managing application package content in an Application Virtualization Server-based deployment.

segment.source: Planning for Application Virtualization Client Deployment
segment.target: Planning for Application Virtualization Client Deployment

segment.source: Provides important planning considerations for deploying the Application Virtualization Client.
segment.target: Provides important planning considerations for deploying the Application Virtualization Client.

segment.source: Planning for Migration from Previous Versions
segment.target: Planning for Migration from Previous Versions

segment.source: Identifies the steps for upgrading from a previous version and lists several important factors to consider.
segment.target: Identifies the steps for upgrading from a previous version and lists several important factors to consider.

segment.source: Planning for Security and Protection
segment.target: Planning for Security and Protection

segment.source: Provides information about enhanced security features in Application Virtualization 4.5.
segment.target: Provides information about enhanced security features in Application Virtualization 4.5.

segment.target: Application Virtualization Reference
